title: Publish (redeploy) VAANI testing build

requirements.text: Redeploy the existing VAANI project (do not initialize a new project) to produce a publicly accessible testing build, retrying deployment if the previous attempt errored.

quotes: bro lets publish this project vaani for testing

acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment is completed for the existing VAANI project (not a new canister/app).
If a deployment error occurs, the deployment is retried and completes successfully.
The deployed app is reachable in a browser as a testing build.

requirements.text: After redeploying, verify the live testing build against the checklist in `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md` (initial unauthenticated load, login flow, authenticated navigation, logout flow, idle timeout, logo verification, and console verification).

quotes: bro lets publish this project vaani for testing

acceptanceCriteria: All checklist items in `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md` can be confirmed in the live environment.
No provider-related console errors occur (e.g., "useAuth must be used within AuthProvider" / "useInternetIdentity must be used within InternetIdentityProvider").
No broken image/asset 404 errors occur for the header logo asset.

constraints: Do not initialize a new project; redeploy the existing VAANI web app using the current draft.
Deployment scope is limited to the existing UI-only changes already described for VAANI (no new features).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new backend features or changing backend data schema.
Introducing new authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Adding new pages or routes beyond what already exists for VAANI.
